class.name: VisualShaderNodeTextureParameterTriplanar
class.brief_description: Performs a uniform texture lookup with triplanar within the visual shader graph.
class.description: Performs a lookup operation on the texture provided as a uniform for the shader, with support for triplanar mapping.

members.member: If [code]true[/code], triplanar mapping is calculated in world space rather than object local space. See also [member BaseMaterial3D.uv1_world_triplanar].
